subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: CHICAGO, July 18 (AP) — Carlos Zambrano pitched five shutout innings to become the National League’s first 12-game winner and Koyie Hill drove in a career-high five runs Wednesday as the surging Cubs beat the San Francisco Giants, 12-1.
snippet: CHICAGO, July 18 (AP) — Carlos Zambrano pitched five shutout innings to become the National League’s first 12-game winner and Koyie Hill drove in a career-high five runs Wednesday as the surging Cubs beat the San Francisco Giants, 12-1.
